sn4.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava baranasiyam viharati isipatane migadaye.
sn4.4:2.1: “Mayham kho, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara yoniso sammappadhana anuttara vimutti anuppatta, anuttara vimutti sacchikata.
sn4.4:2.2: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara yoniso sammappadhana anuttaram vimuttim anupapunatha, anuttaram vimuttim sacchikarotha”ti.
sn4.4:2.3: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
